trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Cordova
There were no other sightings in Cordova on or around July 15th 2010
Summary: I came outside i saw it setting over a garage it came towards me stopped at 20ft from me hovered then turned and flew off going like 5 mph
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the traylor in cordova,al I came outside i walked out in the yard i looked over to my right and hovering over this garage on the other side of the train tracks was this metallic silver egg shaped ufo it came towards me and stopped about 20 ft from me it was over the grave yard at that point it hovered with no sound there was no thought running through my head i just watched it it turned where i could see the complete side of it then i noticed a little purple light on the back of it then it went about 5 mph and flew over the top of the houses i watched it until i couldnt see it any longer i knew it was not man it flew in straight lines until it stopped and turned it never faded or nothing it was a solid object
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
